PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object.

Force.description: How much to force the player to follow the path.

ForceInPath.description: How much to force the player inwards along the path?

MinDistance.description: The minimum distance the player must be from the path.

MaxDistance.description: The maximum distance the player can be from the path.

CorrectNormal.description: Correct player position using normals of path vertices?

Extra.value: Big invisible boxes (volumes) that force the player along a specified path.
